5155.quoteText: Brainly reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to immediately modify, suspend or terminate your account, the Brainly Services, your Brainly Subscription, and/or any products, services, functionality, information, content or other materials available on, through or in connection with the Brainly Services and/or your Brainly Subscription, including, but not limited to, the Mobile Software, and/or your access to some or all of them without cause and without notice. 5163.quoteText: If you choose to cancel, your cancellation will take effect at the end of the subscription term in which you cancelled, and there are no refunds.
5163.title: no refund policy

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state that, "If you choose to cancel [your subscription], your cancellation will take effect at the end of the subscription term in which you cancelled, and there are no refunds." It also states, "In the event that Brainly suspends or terminates your account, the Brainly Services or your Brainly Subscription, you acknowledge and agree that you shall receive no refund or exchange for any unused time on a Brainly Subscription or any subscription fees or anything else." The Terms of Use (in Part B, applicable to users in Europe) state, "Generally, we cannot give back the fees you pay to us."
